title: DispatcherMiddleware with different loggers per app in flask 1.0
raw_output: Issue 2866 reports problems with DispatcherMiddleware when different Flask apps have different loggers. The logging setup doesn't properly isolate loggers per app. Predicted files: (1) src/flask/logging.py - the logging module that handles logger setup. (2) CHANGES.rst - changelog entry. (3) tests/test_logging.py - logging-specific tests. Exploration: Matched src/flask/logging.py -> tests/test_logging.py for test coverage.
